Subject: Client Upgrades not completing
Description:
I am having trouble upgrading all of our virtual machines to the new EPP version 6.2.3.1 and I am not sure what could be causing it. Most of our virtual machines ate on 6.2.2.1 and an upgrade job is scheduled. Some machines are on 6.0.1.6 still.

I managed to log into a problem machine but couldn't determine the issue. What are my options from here?
Solution_Comment__c: The customer was facing issues with updating epp agents using the Update Client Software feature. The update job was containing 400+ computers and we recommended to delete the current job and create others small update jobs.
